entries.name: add_observer(observer, func=:update)
entries.desc: Add observer as an observer on this object. So that it will receive notifications.

entries.name: changed(state=true)
entries.desc: Set the changed state of this object.  Notifications will be sent only if the changed state is true.

entries.name: changed?()
entries.desc: Returns true if this object's state has been changed since the last notify_observers call.

entries.name: count_observers()
entries.desc: Return the number of observers associated with this object.

entries.name: delete_observer(observer)
entries.desc: Remove observer as an observer on this object so that it will no longer receive notifications.

entries.name: delete_observers()
entries.desc: Remove all observers associated with this object.

entries.name: notify_observers(*arg)
entries.desc: Notify observers of a change in state if this object's changed state is true.
